welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Douglasville, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, historic sites, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Fulton County Airport, where all commercial flights are operated.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at College Park Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal North
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal South
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
